main.description: Community's proof/confirmation of a member's membership (stored in community's repo). Deleting this record effectively removes the member from the community, even if their own membership record persists in their PDS.

memberDid.description: DID of the member whose membership is being confirmed

membershipRef.description: AT-URI reference to the user's community.opensocial.membership record

cid.description: CID of the member's community.opensocial.membership record

confirmedAt.description: When the membership was confirmed by the community
